channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dumped bikes blocking all residents parking, 15th June
item.description:
3 Lime Bikes dumped across the road blocking two houses from parking Lots his is an ongoing problem for Pelton Road please remove Litter , dumping and bikes are ruining our quality of life.

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping, 15th June
item.description:
Packaging - polystyrene and plastic. Please could it be removed. Some of the packaging has spread to the end of the road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 44, The Vista, Middle Park, London

item.title: Queens Drive, 15th June
item.description:
Queens drive is disgusting, it's not been swept properly for weeks, the same rubbish is lying around, that was present 3 weeks ago. the bins are overflowing, as there are clearly not enough of them..please provide more bins & a better service
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Queens Drive, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Both side of the road from st. Paul’s wood hill - Clarendon way, 15th June
item.description:
Both sides of the road have land slip and weed encroachment on the road due to years of neglect at street cleaning. Looking back on street view the road has kirb stones, these are no longer visible. I’ve reported parts in the past but needs work done on the entire length of road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 200, Leesons Hill, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned silver Mercedes (reg: KY02 VUC) in Winslade House car park (E5 9LA). Vehicle is very dirty, has a missing wing mirror, flat tyre, and appears unused for a long time., 15th June
item.description:
